description: An Event Stream resource of Amazon Connect Customer Profiles

Uri.description: The StreamARN of the destination to deliver profile events to. For example, arn:aws:kinesis:region:account-id:stream/stream-name
Uri.markdownDescription:
The StreamARN of the destination to deliver profile events to. For example, arn:aws:kinesis:region:account-id:stream/stream-name

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: The status of enabling the Kinesis stream as a destination for export.
Status.markdownDescription:
The status of enabling the Kinesis stream as a destination for export.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: HEALTHY | UNHEALTHY  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

DomainName.description: The unique name of the domain.
DomainName.markdownDescription:
The unique name of the domain.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

EventStreamName.description: The name of the event stream.
EventStreamName.markdownDescription:
The name of the event stream.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.markdownDescription:
The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.

Required: No

Update requires: No interruption

EventStreamArn.description: A unique identifier for the event stream.
EventStreamArn.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the event stream.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

CreatedAt.description: The timestamp of when the export was created.
CreatedAt.markdownDescription:
The timestamp of when the export was created.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

State.description: The operational state of destination stream for export.
State.markdownDescription:
The operational state of destination stream for export.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: RUNNING | STOPPED
